Pelior Ashellon is the most prolific cleric of Cerys, the Queen of Angels. Pelior lived her life as a Verenian Watcher, taking on many contracts over the course of her career, and growing in strength and in her dedication to her deity. Pelior is now in retirement, isolated away in a sanctuary of her own making on the top of Mount Berus on the northern island of Verftet.

Pelior is a grizzled war veteran, and while she tries to conduct herself with compassion, dignity and grace, she is not afraid to fight to defend the honor of Her Radiance, or to defend herself against the onslaught of any that would do her harm.

Pelior would open a fight with a casting of spiritual weapon (at 6th level) and spirit guardians, relying on her {@link War Caster|https://5e.tools/feats.html#war%20caster_phb,fbsr:war%20cast} feat and legendary resistances to ensure that the latter stays up for as long as possible. She'll use legendary actions to keep pushing her aggressive battle routine closer and closer to the enemy, striking them with her warhammer and spiritual weapon as much as possible. Being a cleric herself, she would know how to focus down any healing enemies, and as a retired Verenian Watcher she has a good understanding of how to prioritize a well-balanced adventuring party that is working together.
